##Quezon Memorial Circle
Quezon Memorial Circle is one of the National Parks in the Philippines.  It has a mausoleum (*Quezon Memorial Shrine*) where the remains of the second official President of the Philippines, **Manuel L. Quezon**, is contained.

```{r, eval=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
library(leaflet)

QMC <- leaflet() %>%
  addTiles()
QMC
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(leaflet)

QMC <- leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers(lat=14.651489, lng=121.049309, popup="This is where Pres. Manuel L. Quezon's remains is")
QMC
```
